rpc.util
Class CausalModelUtil

java.lang.Object
  rpc.util.CausalModelUtil

public class CausalModelUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class that defines methods used in the causal model generator and mapping for consistent naming conventions of variables and vertices.

Converts the given variable to the standard name used for vertices.

the name used for the vertex representation of the variable.

crossList

public static java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> crossList(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> lists)
Computes the cross product of elements in each list.

Parameters:
lists - a list of lists of objects from which to take the cross product.
Returns:
a list of list of objects consisting of the cross product of all elements within each of the input lists.

uniformDirichlet

public static double[] uniformDirichlet(int k)
Sample from a uniform dirichlet, assuming alpha_1, ..., alpha_k are all equal to 1. Uses the special case of sampling from k gamma distributions.

Parameters:
k - the number of values to sample.
Returns:
a uniform dirichlet probability distribution of k values.

boundedPareto

public static double boundedPareto()
Sample from a bounded Pareto distribution with hard-coded lower and upper bounds of 3 and 20. Useful for generating expected number of links between entities.

Returns:
a value sampled from the bounded Pareto distribution with lower and upper bounds of 3 and 20.
